title: It's not big as I thought
'Good
column5: Pens are sturdy n received well packed. Lead is also thick n doesn't break easily. Best for kids.

body: 'The media could not be loaded. It is a plastic pencil Mechanical pencil lead 12 pieces no only 10 pieces as mentioned in this packet...'

title: 'no sharper included'
body: 'there is no sharperner hence of no use. dnt buy after reading the review that it has sharperner at the back.. bcos its not and its not mentioned in product detail as well as no picture of sharperner at the back. It is useless'

title: Note : it's not metal but Cheap quality plastic
body: 'Lead quality is good but pencil is made up of cheap plastic that could break on light pressure'

title: 'Works well but all plastic'
body: It looks like the pencil is metallic and seems like a premium product but once you hold it, you realise it's just fibre coated with metallic finish.

title: 'Just wish the sharpener was better'
body: It's actually a really good mechanical pencil, i just wish the sharpener at the rear end made the tip alittle more pointy, other than that it's a fantastic pencil with a comfortable body type
